item.title: Auth JS fundamentals

It is similar to a how-to but the focus is more technical and geared towards developers integrating an SDK, API, or another library into their applications.

They might include code snippets such as API requests and responses, or outline how to develop the required solution but without walking through the majority of the code required to implement it.

item.title: Mobile apps
item.description: Mobile apps Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Mobile apps: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/mobile-apps/ Structure type: Navigation Content type: Summary redirect A redirect provides a summary of a topic with links to the articles elsewhere in the site that cover that content in full.Â For example: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/oie-upgrade-sign-in-widget-styling/main/ summarizes the options for styling the sign-in widget and links to a more in-depth page for each of them.
